CustomField.description: Key initiatives may have one or more sub-processes within value streams which are a critical make-or-break part of success.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a zone (sub-process owned by a specific team in the enterprise) which is critical to achieving this key initiative. NOTE: The zone does not have to be related to the value stream entered on this page, nor do you have to select a value stream.
CustomField.label: Zone
